pma:database.name: iptv_users
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `device_bindings` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int NOT NULL, `account_key` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `device_fingerprint` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `user_agent` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `ip_address` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `last_seen` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `account_key` (`account_key`), UNIQUE KEY `unique_user_binding` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `device_bindings_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `device_binding_logs` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int NOT NULL, `action` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `fingerprint` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `user_agent` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `ip_address` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `idx_created` (`created_at`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `playlist_sessions` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `account_key` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `fingerprint` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `user_agent` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `ip_address` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `last_seen` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `account_key` (`account_key`), KEY `fingerprint` (`fingerprint`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `registration_attempts` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ip_address` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `attempt_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `is_suspicious` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `ip_address` (`ip_address`), KEY `attempt_time` (`attempt_time`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `users` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `email` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `ip_address` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `last_login` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status` enum('active','suspended','deleted') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'active', `device_count` int DEFAULT '0', `last_device_reset` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `username` (`username`), UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

CREATE TABLE `xtream_codes` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int NOT NULL, `xtream_username` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `xtream_password` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `is_active` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1', `is_device_bound` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), UNIQUE KEY `xtream_username` (`xtream_username`), CONSTRAINT `xtream_codes_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
